==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|収|支}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しゅうし}}

# [[incomings]] and [[outgoings]], [[earnings]] and [[expenses]]

====Derived terms====
{{top2}}
* {{l|ja|収支計画}} (''shūshi keikaku''): income and expenditure plan
* {{l|ja|収支決算}} (''shūshi kessan''): settling a balance
* {{l|ja|収支報告}} (''shūshi hōkoku''): earnings call
* {{l|ja|移転収支}} (''iten shūshi''): balance of transfer account
* {{l|ja|営業収支}} (''eigyō shūshi''): operating balance
* {{l|ja|経常収支}} (''keijō shūshi''): current account balance
* {{l|ja|国際収支}} (''kokusai shūshi''): international balance of payments
{{mid2}}
* {{l|ja|財政収支}} (''zaisei shūshi''): fiscal balance
* {{l|ja|資本収支}} (''shihon shūshi''): capital account balance
* {{l|ja|総合収支}} (''sōgō shūshi''): overall balance of payments
* {{l|ja|貿易収支}} (''bōeki shūshi''): trade balance
* {{l|ja|貿易外収支}} (''bōeki-gai shūshi''): invisible trade balance
* {{l|ja|貿易サービス収支}} (''bōeki sābisu shūshi''): balance on goods and services
* {{l|ja|基礎的財政収支}} (''kisoteki zaisei shūshi''): primary balance
